speaker: Secret Anvil
lines: Behind the bookcase-that-is-sometimes-a-door, a small anvil waits like a kept promise.
It is not big enough to impress, only to matter.
The runed strip in your pocket hums when you set it on the face.
A hammer on the wall has a handle polished by one set of hands.
You know who. You do not know how you know.
Outside, the shop talks. In here, the work listens.
You can weld your name to iron and be different after.
Or you can leave it and be different in another way.

choices.text: Strike and swear the Oath of Iron.
Turn away and keep the runed strip.

give_item.name: Runed Strip
give_item.description: Sharp in a way only some notice

choices.text: Test the hammer on your doubts first (fight).
